description.raw:
This requires a number of pull requests including:

1. https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/260
2. ~~https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/104~~
3.~~https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/371~~
4. ~~https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/51~~
5.~~https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/202~~

Once everything is in place we'll be able to run simulation and spawn a team using:

1. `ign launch -f competition.ign -v 4`
2. `ign launch -f team.ign -v 4`
